description: This notification signifies that the high memory buffering threshold
for MFWD has reached at the SPIC level.
The gateway name, SPIC name and memory buffer threshold will be

event.Summary: MFWD buffer memory usage $v3 % reached high threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdBufMemThresRaise JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdServicePicName s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdBufMemLimit u 9999

description: This identifies the session-pic, in the form ms-a/b/0,
where <a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdServicePicName

description: This indicates the percentage of total buffer memory being used
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdBufMemLimit

description: This notification signifies that the low memory buffering threshold
for MFWD has reached at the SPIC level.
The gateway name, SPIC name and memory buffer threshold will be

event.Summary: MFWD buffer memory usage $v3 % is normal

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdBufMemThresClear JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdServicePicName s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdBufMemLimit u 9999

description: This identifies the session-pic, in the form ms-a/b/0,
where <a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdServicePicName

description: This indicates the percentage of total buffer memory being used
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GW-SGW-MFWD-MIB::jnxMbgSgwMfwdBufMemLimit
